method.name: ReconnectChannels
method.annotation: Restarts all channels or a single channel

arg.name: Channel URI
arg.desc: URI of the channel to restart. All channels are restarted if no argument is provided. (Optional)

method.name: ResumeDestinations
method.annotation: Resumes one or all of the destinations of one or all of the channels, depending on the arguments provided.

arg.name: Channel URI
arg.desc: URI of the channel whose destination(s) are to be resumed. Destination(s) of all of the channels are resumed if no argument is provided.

arg.name: Destination Name
arg.desc: Name of the destination to be resumed (in one or all of the channels). All of the destinations in one or all of the channels are resumed if no argument is provided.

method.name: SuspendDestinations
method.annotation: Suspends one or all of the destinations of one or all of the channels, depending on the arguments provided.

arg.name: Channel URI
arg.desc: URI of the channel whose destination(s) are to be suspended. Destination(s) of all the channels are suspended if no argument is provided.

arg.name: Destination Name
arg.desc: Name of the destination to be suspended (in one or all of the channels). All of the destinations in one or all of the channels are suspended if no argument is provided.

method.name: GetChannels
method.annotation: Retrieves channel info

arg.name: Channel URI
arg.desc: URI of the channel. Info of all the channels is returned if no argument is provided.

method.name: GetDestinations
method.annotation: Retrieves destination info

arg.name: Channel URI
arg.desc: URI of the channel whose destination(s) info is to be retrieved. Destination(s) info of all the channels is returned if no argument is provided.

arg.name: Destination Name
arg.desc: Name of the destination whose info is to be retrived (in one or all the channels). All of the destinations in one or all of the channels are retrieved if no argument is provided.

method.name: GetSessionInputDestinations
method.annotation: Retrieves the destinations enabled for input in the specified session

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session for which enabled destinations are to be shown.

method.name: GetLoggerNamesWithLevels
method.annotation: Get all loggers with their level

method.name: GetHostInformation
method.annotation: Gets the value of the specified host information property, or of all properties if none specified

arg.name: Name
arg.desc: Name of the property whose value is to be obtained.

method.name: GetNumberOfEvents
method.annotation: Gets the total number of events existing in the specified session or in every session

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the Session.

method.name: GetNumberOfInstances
method.annotation: Gets the total number of instances existing in the specified session or in every session

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the Session.

method.name: GetEvent
method.annotation: Retrieves an event with the specified Id from the specified Session or from every Session

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session. Iterates over all sessions if no argument is provided.

arg.name: Id
arg.desc: Id of the Event

arg.name: isExternal
arg.desc: String representing Boolean. True to use the event's external Id. False to use the internal Id.

method.name: GetInstance
method.annotation: Retrieves an instance with the specified Id from the specified Session or from every Session

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session. Iterates over all sessions if no argument is provided.

arg.name: Id
arg.desc: Id of the Instance

arg.name: isExternal
arg.desc: String representing Boolean: 'true' to use the event's external Id, 'false' to use the internal Id.

method.name: GetInstanceByUri
method.annotation: Retrieves an instance with the specified extid and uri from the specified Session or from every Session. Introduced specially for SN persistance.

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session. Iterates over all sessions if no argument is provided.

arg.name: ExtId
arg.desc: Ext Id of the Instance

arg.name: URI
arg.desc: Uri of the Instance.

method.name: GetScorecards
method.annotation: No URI provided: Returns a table with of all of the scorecards in the specified Session or in every Session. URI provided: retrieves scorecard information in the specified Session or in every Session

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session. Iterates over all sessions if no argument is provided.

arg.name: Scorecard URI
arg.desc: URI of the scorecard to retrieve information. Returns a table with of all of the scorecards if no argument is provided.

method.name: StartFileBasedProfiler
method.annotation: Turns On BusinessEvents profiler and starts collecting data for the specified duration. When the time is complete or the Profiler is turned Off, profiling data will be saved to a file in comma separated format

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session. Optional if only one session exists.

arg.name: FileName
arg.desc: Absolute path of the file to where the profiling data is to be saved.

arg.name: Level
arg.desc: Level of depth profiling data will be collected. Pick -1 for all levels, 1 for RTC level only

arg.name: Duration
arg.desc: Time interval, in seconds, the profiling data will be collected. If a negative value is provided the profiler will be On until explicitly turned Off.

method.name: StopFileBasedProfiler
method.annotation: Turns Off BusinessEvents profiler and stops collecting data. Profiling data is stored in a file in comma separated format

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session. Optional if only one session exists.

method.annotation: Resumes the RuleServiceProvider

method.name: SuspendRuleServiceProvider
method.annotation: Suspends the RuleServiceProvider

method.name: ActivateRule
method.annotation: Activates a Rule in the specified inference session or in every inference session. Other session types are disregarded.

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the inference session where the rule is going to be activated. The rule with the specified URI is activated in every inference session if no session name is provided.

arg.name: URI
arg.desc: URI of the Rule

method.name: DeactivateRule
method.annotation: Deactivates a Rule in the specified inference session or in every inference session. Other session types are disregarded.

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the inference session where the rule is going to be deactivated. The rule with the specified URI is deactivated in every inference session if no session name is provided.

arg.name: URI
arg.desc: URI of the Rule

method.name: ResetTotalNumberRulesFired
method.annotation: Resets the total number of rules fired to zero for the specified inference session or for every inference session. Other session types are disregarded.

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the inference session in which the rules fired counter is to be reset. The rules fired counter is reset in every inference session if no session name is provided.

method.name: GetRule
method.annotation: Gets info about the rule with the specified URI for the specified inference session or for every inference session. Other session types are disregarded.

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the inference session where the rule info is to be obtained. Rule info is retrieved for every inference session if no session name is provided.

arg.name: Rule URI
arg.desc: URI of the Rule

method.name: GetRules
method.annotation: Gets a table listing the rules deployed for the specified inference session or for every inference session. Other session types are disregarded.

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the inference session from where the deployed rules list is to be retrieved. Deployed rules info is retrieved for every inference session if no session name is provided.

method.name: GetTotalNumberRulesFired
method.annotation: Gets a table listing the total number of rules fired for the specified inference session or for every inference session

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the inference session. Total number of rules fired is retrieved for every inference session if no session name is provided.

method.annotation: Gets a table listing every active session
